description.excerpt: Lectures for INFO8010 - Deep Learning, ULiège, Spring 2021.

Classroom: Lectures are virtual and broadcast on Youtube. 
Discussion: Join us on Discord (see invitation link in emails)

| March 22 | Deadline for Homework 2 | | March 26 | (No lecture)
Deadline for the project proposal |
| May 17 | Deadline for the project (code and report) |

The goal of these two assignments is to get you familiar with the PyTorch library. 
Each homework should be done in groups of 2 or 3 (the same as for the project) and must be submitted on the Montefiore submission platform before 23:59 on the due date.

See instructions in project.md. 
Your task is to read and summarize a major scientific paper in the field of deep learning. You are free to select one among the following three papers: 
T. Karras al, "Analyzing and improving the image quality of StyleGAN", 2020. [pdf]

M. Cranmer et al, "Discovering Symbolic Models from Deep Learning with Inductive Biases", 2020. [pdf] 
You should produce a report that summarizes the problem that is tackled by the paper and explains why it is challenging or important, from the perspective of the wider research context. The report should outline the main contributions and results with respect to the problem that is addressed. It should also include a critical discussion of the advantages and shortcomings of the contributions of the paper.
- You can work in groups of maximum 3 students.
Your report should be submitted  by April 30, 2021 at 23:59 on the submission platform. This is a hard deadline.
Lectures for INFO8010 - Deep Learning, ULiège
